subject: College Athletics
Drug Abuse and Traffic
lead_paragraph: Sean Sutton, a former Oklahoma State coach who had replaced his father, Eddie, in 2006, pleaded not guilty in Stillwater, Okla., to four felonies.
snippet: Sean Sutton, a former Oklahoma State coach who had replaced his father, Eddie, in 2006, pleaded not guilty in Stillwater, Okla., to four felonies.
